thread.title: Transfer news LIVE: Arsenal, Manchester United, Liverpool and Chelsea latest from the January window
thread.title_full: Transfer news LIVE: Arsenal, Manchester United, Liverpool and Chelsea latest from the January window

author: Football Spy
title: Transfer news LIVE: Arsenal, Manchester United, Liverpool and Chelsea latest from the January window
text:
06:25 Howdy cowboys and cowgirls 
Good morning ladies and gents, how are we all on this fine Tuesday morning? Ready for another day at the transfer rumour mill coalface? Thought so. 
We’re halfway through the January sales and things are starting to get very interesting. 
A total of £185million was spent by Premier League clubs a year ago and this month could well be a similar affair, with sides ready to open the chequebook again to bolster title charges, European pushes or survival campaigns. 
Will the Manchester clubs follow their big-spending summers with some more new faces? Should Jurgen Klopp bring in some more bodies as he tries to end Liverpool’s title drought? Will Arsene Wenger splash the cash? 
And what about the players that have been linked with moves away? Dimitri Payet is enemy number one in east London, while across town questions are being asked about Diego Costa’s future at Chelsea. 
We will have all the latest news, views, opinion and, of course, those all-important done deals throughout the day so stick with us. 
Without further ado, in the immortal words of Steven George Gerrard, we go again. (Photo: Copyright Unknown)
